#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN
#define xx first
#define yy second
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef pair<ll,ll> pll;
typedef vector<ll> vll;

int main()
{
	int T;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		string L,K;
		cin>>L>>K;
		int valid = 1;
		if(L.length() != K.length() + 1)	valid = 0;
		int j = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < K.length() && valid == 1; i++,j++)
		{
			while(j < L.length() && L[j] != K[i])	j++;
			if(j-i > 1)	valid = 0;
		}
		cout<<valid<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
